name: Let's Pass On That
Lore: '''Uu a''kingsa riika pagh bagla bis kachata weenow con bantha poodoo.''',
Text: 'During opponent''s control phase, your ferocious creature attacks. At end of turn, if that creature is at an unoccupied site and did not move, opponent loses 1 Force and you retrieve 1 Force. OR Use 3 Force to retrieve a creature.',
